interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Croods 2-Movie Collection [DVD]
Review Date: 2021/09/19
Store: Nicolas Cage  (Actor),     Emma Stone  (Actor),     Kirk DeMicco  (Director, Writer),     Joel Crawford  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ['The Croods: Join the Croods on the journey of a lifetime in the epic comedy-adventure about the family bonds that are tested but can never be broken. When Guy (Ryan Reynolds), an inventive young man, comes into Eep\'s (Emma Stone) life, her father, Grug (Nicolas Cage), sees his status as the protector of the family threatened. When their cave is destroyed, the Croods have no choice but to trust the newcomer and set out to explore a spectacular landscape filled with fantastic creatures, strange surprises and a whole new world of adventure! The Croods: A New Age: The first prehistoric family is ready for another rocking adventure! The Croods have survived fanged beasts, natural disasters, and even young love, but now they must face their biggest challenge yet: another family! In search of a new home, the Croods discover a walled-in paradise created by the sophisticated Betterman family (emphasis on the "better"). As they try to coexist, the differences between the two families escalate into a full-blown feud, but when a new threat forces both families to embark on an epic adventure, they must all learn to work together…or they\'ll all go extinct! Nicolas Cage, Emma Stone, Ryan Reynolds, and Peter Dinklage star in this hilarious animated comedy for the whole family!', 'Bonus Content:', 'Disc 1 - The Croods:', "Belt's Cave Journal", "Belt's Cave Journal", "Croods' Cut (Lost Scenes)", "Croods' Cut (Lost Scenes)", 'Disc 2 - The Croods: A New Age:', "Dear Diary: World's First Pranks", "Dear Diary: World's First Pranks", 'Family Movie Night: Little Red Bronana Bread', 'Family Movie Night: Little Red Bronana Bread', 'Gag Reel', 'Gag Reel', 'To: Gerard', 'To: Gerard', 'Deleted Scenes', 'Deleted Scenes', "The Croods' Family Album", "The Croods' Family Album", 'The Evolution Of...', 'The Evolution Of...', 'How to Draw: Caveman Style', 'How to Draw: Caveman Style', 'Famileaf Album', 'Famileaf Album', 'Stone Age Snack Attack', 'Stone Age Snack Attack', 'Feature Commentary with Director Joel Crawford, Producer Mark Swift, Head of Story Januel Mercado and Editor Jim Ryan', 'Feature Commentary with Director Joel Crawford, Producer Mark Swift, Head of Story Januel Mercado and Editor Jim Ryan', ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.8

reference_summary:
Redemption Road
Peebles, Mario Van  (Director),     Duncan, Michael Clarke  (Actor),     Simpson, Morgan  (Actor)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Drama
['In Mario Van Peeble\'s new film "Redemption Road," two seemingly different men (Michael Clarke Duncan and Morgan Simpson) embark on a music-steeped journey through the American South, learning along the way that life isn\'t about where you end up - it\'s how you get there that matters. Somewhere along the 900 miles between Austin, TX and Huntsville, AL the two men become unlikely friends. However, every road has an end. In Huntsville, sad truths come to light, with heartbreak and violence lingering in their wake, ultimately leaving both men changed forever. The music of "Redemption Road" is permeated with authenticity, from Country music - perfectly befitting the film\'s Nashville locations - to the full scope of the Blues with a pinch of good old-fashioned Gospel to reflect the film\'s deeper themes of faith.']

Can not even see the, complete series from the beginning to the end.

Stephen King's The Stand
Ruby Dee  (Actor),     Miguel Ferrer  (Actor),     Mick Garris  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Mystery & Thrillers
["Originally aired as a television mini-series, this all-star filmization of Stephen King's gripping epic of good versus evil chronicles the episodic adventures of a disparate group of people who struggle to reestablish civilization after a man-made catastrophe wipes out most of the world's population. The world abruptly ends when a deadly virus accidentally escapes from a government sponsored biological warfare laboratory. Soon people are dropping like flies from the plague, but a few survive and find themselves strangely compelled to head into the West. Good-hearted people follow the voice of an ancient black woman and head for Boulder, Colorado. Bad people follow the enigmatic Walkin' Dude to Las Vegas. It is only a matter of time before the two sides are forced into a climactic battle over the final fate of humanity."]

["Experience the epic adventure of The Hunger Games series from start to finish in this action packed collector's set! Follow Katniss Everdeen's transformation from Tribute to ''The Girl on Fire'' to the symbolic leader of the rebellion, The Mockingjay, in this thrilling collection that movie lovers will treasure. Featuring all four films, The Hunger Games Collection contains over fourteen hours of special features that take you behind the scenes of the movie phenomenon."]

Drop Dead Fred
Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy
["Rik Mayall gives a typically manic performance in this rip roaringly funny comedy. This hilarious film also stars Phoebe Cates , Bridget Fonda and Carrie Fisher. When Elizabeth (Cates) returns to her mother's home when her marriage breaks up, she recreates her imaginary childhood friend, Fred (Mayall), to escape from the trauma of losing her husband and her job. In between the chaos and mayhem that Fred creates, Elizabeth desperately attempts to win back her husband and return to normality, with comical results."]

- **Movie Preferences:** The user maintains a strong fondness for drama films centered on music, particularly blues and narratives rich in cultural and musical elements tied to American Southern themes. Their interest in action and adventure continues to thrive, with a notable willingness to explore comedic narratives, despite previous mixed results. Their engagement with supernatural themes and emotionally resonant stories remains a key focus.

- **Rating Behavior:** The user generally provides positive ratings but recently rated a purchase low after experiencing dissatisfaction. However, their latest review reflects a return to favorable ratings, underscoring their expectations for quality content that emphasizes compelling storytelling.

- **Engagement with Themes:** They favor narratives exploring personal journeys, friendships, and emotional depths while appreciating character development. Their foray into comedy now shows potential compatibility, reflecting their ongoing exploration of various genres, including mystery and thrillers.

- **Content Consumption Style:** The user prefers DVD formats for comprehensive storytelling and shows openness to genres like action, supernatural, and now comedy. They balance genre flexibility with a desire for meaningful narratives that resonate emotionally, and their recent positive review indicates a successful engagement with family-oriented comedic adventure.

Overall, the user exhibits a strong inclination towards emotionally rich narratives while successfully navigating new genre explorations, particularly in comedy, with renewed enthusiasm.
